description:
After accidentally falling asleep, Flip wakes up to a nightmare realization – he just slept through the first day of the World Duel Carnival!  Realizing only the strongest duelists are left, Flip comes up with a sweet plan to get some much-needed Heart Pieces!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Disqualified from the WDC!? Heartland`s Assassins, Droite and Gauche
WDC(ワールド・デュエル・カーニバル)失格!? ハートランドの刺客ドロワ&ゴーシュ
World Duel Carnival Shikkaku!? Heartland no Shikyaku Droite & Gauche
